brandGuidance.style: Clean pixel art with defined outlines, storybook aesthetic, warm palette
brandGuidance.materials: Leather, cloth, iron - NO glowing effects, NO energy weapons
brandGuidance.characters: Anthropomorphic woodland animals ONLY - NO humans ever
brandGuidance.palette: Warm browns, creams, forest greens, honey golds - NO neon

prompt.subject: Finn Riverstone - Young river otter warrior (protagonist)
prompt.physique: Athletic build, standing about 4 heads tall, river otter proportions - sleek body, webbed paws, thick rudder tail
prompt.fur: Rich chocolate brown fur with cream-colored chest and muzzle, visible fur texture with individual strands suggested
prompt.face: Bright intelligent eyes (dark amber), small rounded ears, whiskers, determined but kind expression
prompt.outfit: Worn leather vest with brass toggles, cloth belt with small pouch, simple iron sword (the Otterblade) in leather sheath on back, travel-worn cloak clasped at shoulder
prompt.animation: Idle breathing cycle - subtle chest rise/fall, tail sway, ear twitch, weight shift between feet. 8 frames for smooth loop.
prompt.pose: Standing profile facing RIGHT, feet shoulder-width apart, one paw resting near belt, alert but relaxed
prompt.style: Pixel art, 128x128 per frame, transparent background, side-view platformer perspective
prompt.lighting: Warm ambient as if lit by afternoon sun, subtle rim light suggesting depth
prompt.negative: NO humans, NO glowing weapons, NO neon colors, NO anime style, NO chibi proportions

prompt.subject: Finn Riverstone running
prompt.description: Full run cycle showing otter's distinctive bounding gait. Tail acts as counterbalance.
prompt.animation: 8-frame run cycle: contact, down, passing, up (both sides). Arms pump naturally, cloak trails behind.
prompt.physicsNotes: Show weight and momentum - compression on landing, extension on push-off. Otters have a rolling, efficient run.
prompt.details: Maintain exact character design from idle sprite. Sword bounces slightly in sheath.
prompt.style: Pixel art matching idle sheet exactly
prompt.negative: NO floating/weightless feel, NO stiff robotic movement

prompt.subject: Finn Riverstone jump sequence
prompt.animation: 6 frames: crouch anticipation, launch (legs extended), rise (tucked), apex (spread), fall (legs down), land compression
prompt.details: Cloak billows upward on rise, settles on fall. Tail extends for balance. Arms reach up then brace for landing.
prompt.style: Pixel art matching character design exactly
prompt.negative: NO floaty physics, NO superhero poses

prompt.subject: Finn sword attack 3-hit combo
prompt.weapon: The Otterblade - simple but well-crafted iron sword with leather-wrapped grip, slight curve, NOT glowing
prompt.animation: 12 frames total: Draw (2) → Slash right (3) → Slash left (3) → Overhead finish (3) → Recovery (1)
prompt.movement: Each swing has clear anticipation (wind-up) and follow-through. Body rotates with swings.
prompt.details: Sword reflects light naturally (metal glint, not magic glow). Cloak swirls with momentum.
prompt.hitboxVisual: Arc of sword swing should be clear and readable for gameplay
prompt.style: Pixel art, wider frames (160px) to accommodate sword reach
prompt.negative: NO energy trails, NO glowing blade, NO laser effects

prompt.subject: Finn taking damage
prompt.animation: 4 frames: Impact flinch, stumble back, catch self, recovery stance
prompt.expression: Pained wince, gritted teeth, determination returning
prompt.details: One arm comes up defensively. Body recoils from hit direction. Tail tucks slightly.

prompt.subject: Finn crouching and sliding
prompt.animation: 4 frames: Stand-to-crouch, crouch idle, slide start, slide momentum
prompt.pose: Low crouch with one paw on ground. Slide shows legs forward, body leaning back.
prompt.details: Tail extends back for balance. Cloak drapes over body. Clear low profile for dodging.
prompt.utility: For passing under obstacles and dodging attacks

prompt.subject: Finn defeated/death sequence
prompt.animation: 6 frames: Final hit, stagger, knee buckle, collapse, prone, fade (slight transparency)
prompt.tone: Dignified defeat, not gruesome. Hero falling honorably.
prompt.details: Sword falls from grasp. Cloak settles around body. Fade to slight transparency for respawn.
prompt.style: Pixel art, respectful treatment of defeat
prompt.negative: NO gore, NO blood pools, NO violent death

prompt.subject: Elder Badger - Willowmere's wise keeper
prompt.physique: Large, stocky badger, elderly but still strong, walks with carved oak staff
prompt.fur: Silver-streaked black and white face markings, graying around muzzle, thick winter coat
prompt.outfit: Simple brown robes with rope belt, wooden prayer beads, reading spectacles perched on nose
prompt.expression: Kind, wise, slightly worried eyes. Grandfather energy.
prompt.animation: Row 1: Idle (2 frames breathing), talking gesture (2 frames). Row 2: Pointing direction, blessing gesture, reading scroll, looking up
prompt.role: Quest giver, lore keeper, gives Finn guidance at the Everember
prompt.style: Pixel art, larger frames for imposing presence

prompt.subject: Elderly hedgehog gatekeeper
prompt.physique: Short, round hedgehog with spectacles, slightly hunched from years of watching the gate
prompt.fur: Tan/brown spines going gray, cream-colored face and belly
prompt.outfit: Heavy wool tunic, leather apron with keys and tools hanging from it, warm cap
prompt.expression: Squinting, suspicious at first, then welcoming warmth
prompt.animation: Idle, looking through window, opening gate gesture, nodding approval
prompt.role: Guards the Northern Gatehouse, first to welcome Finn

prompt.subject: Elderly owl librarian/archivist
prompt.physique: Tall tawny owl, dignified posture, large wise eyes behind round spectacles
prompt.plumage: Tawny brown feathers with cream barring, slightly ruffled from age, prominent ear tufts
prompt.outfit: Scholar's robes in deep burgundy, ink-stained wing-tips, quill tucked behind ear tuft
prompt.expression: Scholarly, slightly absent-minded, knows everything but forgets where they put their quill
prompt.animation: Idle with head tilt, pointing to scroll, handing over map, wise nod
prompt.role: Keeper of the Archives, helps Finn find the ancient map
prompt.negative: NO threatening owls, NO predatory poses

prompt.subject: Villager mice - background NPCs
prompt.variants: Row 1: Male farmer (straw hat, pitchfork), female baker (apron, rolling pin), child mouse (simple tunic). Row 2: Same characters in different poses - working, walking, gesturing
prompt.physique: Small field mice, round ears, long tails, friendly proportions
prompt.outfit: Simple medieval peasant clothing - tunics, aprons, caps. Natural wool and linen colors.
prompt.role: Background characters, give sense of community at Willowmere
prompt.negative: NO modern clothing, NO identical copies

prompt.subject: Red squirrel militia member
prompt.physique: Athletic red squirrel, bushy tail, nimble build suited for climbing
prompt.fur: Russet red with cream chest, fluffy ear tufts
prompt.outfit: Light leather armor (practical, not heavy plate), shortbow and quiver, small dagger
prompt.expression: Alert, brave despite nervousness, looking to Finn for leadership
prompt.animation: Row 1: Stand at attention, salute, draw bow, fire arrow. Row 2: Run, climb pose, cheer, determined nod
prompt.role: Defender that Finn rallies in Chapter 6, fights alongside player
prompt.negative: NO heavy armor, NO oversized weapons
